author: Foster J. Provost and Tom Fawcett and Ron Kohavi
title: The Case against Accuracy Estimation for Comparing Induction Algorithms
window: we often do not know whether the existing distribution is the natural distribution, or whether it has been stratified. The iris data set has exactly 50 instances of each class.
